Subject: Linux Server device not listing in Computers
Description:
Hi Team,

We have added EPP clients on our 3 Linux servers recently which are Ubuntu 22.04 and EPP version installed as 2.4.4.1004, but they are not showing up in the Computer list in EPP from last 2 days

Could you please guide us why they are not showing, it is mandatory to apply policy on them.

Regards,
Diwanshu Srivastava
What_We_Know__c:
24 April
-it seems that the issue is related to the client-server communication, so I guided the customer to check the options.sh configuration file, that sets up the communication of the client.
Next_Steps__c:
24 April
- wait for the customer to check the configuration and get back to us
Solution_Comment__c: the issue was resolved by the customer after sending them instructions on how to install the client on linux devices
